definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Moreover, for daylong, you should call an ambulance for me.
sentences.chinese: 再進一步，一天，你應該給我叫救護車了。

sentences.english: Patients must not be attacked, and ambulances and hospitals must not be misused.
sentences.chinese: 不得襲擊傷病員，不得將救護車和醫院用於其他目的。

sentences.english: There was utter pandemonium outside the university building as ambulances carted away the injured.
sentences.chinese: 隨着救護車帶走受傷的人，大學主樓外絕對亂成一團。

sentences.english: A trainer asked me if I needed an ambulance.
sentences.chinese: 一個教練問我需不需要救護車。

sentences.english: How can I call an ambulance?
I glimpsed the dancer balancing herself on the ambulance by chance.
sentences.chinese: 我可巧瞥見跳舞者在救護車上使本身保存均衡。

sentences.english: Xiao Li, make a phone call and call an ambulance.
sentences.chinese: 小麗，到電話叫救護車來。

sentences.english: The ambulance clanged down the street.
sentences.chinese: 救護車丁當地沿街而過。

sentences.english: The pick-up and set-down area was soon crowded with ambulances and fire engines.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的上落區很快就擠滿了救護車和消防車。

sentences.english: Only in Amercia can a pizza get to your house faster than an ambulance.
sentences.chinese: 只有在美國，比薩餅能比救護車更快地到達你的門口。

sentences.english: Dr. Chen's neighbors suggested that the community needed its own ambulances, and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 陳醫生的鄰居表示，社區需要有自己的救護車。

sentences.english: Here, you two, get her into the ambulance.
sentences.chinese: 喂，你們兩個把她擡到救護車上去。

sentences.english: Lincoln works on hot-wiring the ambulance.
The noise that trunks and ambulances made in the street rankles me every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天大街上卡車和救護車的噪音令我惱怒不已。

sentences.english: GPS-enabled electronic tags for personnel and ambulances.
sentences.chinese: GPS功能的電子標籤，人員和救護車。

definition: to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
